apps.name: Cercube
apps.subtitle: An elevated YouTube experience.
apps.versionDescription:
Cercube v5.2.7

* Adds VP9 software decoding that allows for 1440p@60fps and 4K@30fps videos with no frame drops.
* Features like Picture-in-Picture and downloads now work correctly.
apps.localizedDescription:
YouTube is one of the best and most popular video-sharing platform available on the web. It features a range of videos from funny pranks to reviews, gaming content, and daily vlogs by popular influencers.

YouTube also offers an app for iOS which provides a more smooth and enjoyable experience watching videos on your iPhone. Unfortunately, the app lacks a lot of essential features.

Cercube is a third-party app for YouTube that brings tons of amazing new features and functionality. Some of these are:

• Download and save videos up to 4k resolution
• Save videos as audio only
• View, manage and share all your downloads in Cercube's download manager
• Block ads
• Share downloaded videos with other devices via AirDrop
• Background playback for streamed and downloaded videos
• Import downloads to Music or Videos
• Play YouTube videos using Picture-in-Picture mode
• Downloaded videos are displayed within a beautifully crafted downloads manager that shows all the available information
• Choose the default tab to open when launching YouTube
• Stream videos in HD on cellular network
• Auto-replay videos
• Hide floating upload button
• Hide the Trending tab
• Rewind or forward videos
• Cercube options are configurable from within YouTube settings
• Play in high quality on Mobile Data

And many more features. All-in-all, Cercube takes your YouTube experience to a whole new level with all the innovative features that it provides.

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you upload videos you've already created.
This lets you create videos using the app.
Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.

apps.name: Deezer++
apps.subtitle: Mix your music your way.
apps.versionDescription:
The design of the "Share options" sub-menu has been updated for easier navigation.

There is now a trash bin icon next to "Recent searches" in the Search tab that lets you clear your recent search history.

We've revamped the look of the Flow card on the My Music tab.
apps.localizedDescription:
Your life deserves its own soundtrack. With 56 million tracks, playlists and podcasts plus personalized recommendations just for you, Deezer is your music companion. A music player that always gives you the songs you love, and helps you discover your next favorites. You bring the passion, we bring the music.

Enjoy best-in-class features with the Deezer music player:

• Stream the biggest global hits
• 56 million songs to discover and enjoy
• Lean back and find new tracks with Shuffle Mode
• Get personalized recommendations and explore new music styles with Flow
• Listen to any playlist you want or create your own
• Add the tracks you love to your music collection in a single tap with Favorites
• Organise your new music by artist or genre
• Share your personal playlists and favorite tracks with others
• Discover podcasts, radio stations, and audio channels

What do you get for free with Deezer++:

• No ads
• Offline Mode: download your favorite tracks or podcasts and listen to offline music anywhere
• Unlimited skips
• No song shuffling
• Superior Sound Quality (320 kBps)
• Music player is compatible with Amazon Alexa and connected devices

permissions.usageDescription: Deezer needs to access your photos.
Deezer needs to access your camera.
Deezer needs microphone access to use this feature.
Deezer would like to create a calendar event.
Deezer needs Bluetooth access to communicate with Google Assistant devices.
This will be used to improve music recommendations.

apps.localizedDescription:
Spotify++ essentially activates spotify premium on your device with one exception: No downloads.

So what does Spotify++ change?

• All kinds of ads removed
• Unlimited skips
• Play any song or album
• Enable extreme streaming quality
• No forced shuffle
• Import songs from the Music app

apps.name: Twitter++
apps.subtitle: Clean, ad-free Twitter.
apps.localizedDescription:
Adds new features to the iOS Twitter app:

• Share images and links from tweets by long pressing on them
• Share tweets to third-party apps with a tap and hold gesture
• Save video and GIFs to your device with tap and hold gesture
• Download YouTube videos from Twitter to your device
• Set the default browser to open when a link is tapped
• Show the keyboard on Compose instead of media screen
• Automatic Long Tweet Creation - For tweets that are over 140 Chars, Twitter++ allows you to automatically post tweet as an image or using pastebin.
• Displays a confirmation when favoriting a Tweet
• Enable full-screen 
• Video tweets of users who have blocked you

apps.name: Paperback
apps.subtitle: An ad-free manga reader for iOS.
apps.versionDescription:
First public release!

Changelog
• Tag and Advanced search are not limited 50 manga anymore
• Fixed refresh button in follows not doing anything
• Removed Fancy Paged reader

Known Issues
• Crashes upon queueing download, reinstall app to fix it
• Sorting by Recently Updated in Follows view doesn't respect user's selected languages, this cannot be fixed, it's how MD works
apps.localizedDescription:
Paperback is a fully ad-free manga reader for iOS 13 and iPadOS 13.4 and up.

iPad support
• Friendly layout with a robust double spread chapter reader for iPad.

MangaDex integration
• Paperback will sync your mangas and settings to and from MangaDex.

No advertisements
• Unlike other not-to-be-named apps and websites, this is a fully ad-free experience.

If you enjoy the app, please support the developer on Patreon to get access to the beta version of the app: https://www.patreon.com/FaizanDurrani

apps.name: Paperback
apps.subtitle: A beta manga reader for Patrons only.
apps.versionDescription:
THIS BUILD IS NOT TO BE DAILY DRIVEN. Install this build at your own risk, it is an EXTREMELY early preview of sources. This build WILL crash in numerous places, it might also mess up your MDList.

THIS BUILD REQUIRES A REINSTALL

Changelog

• Fixed an issue where search would close when you come back from a manga
• Added continue reading
• Added the ability to open any manga in the browser
• Added Backups to help with migrations between builds (make sure you export the backup to iCloud or phone storage, it will be erased otherwise)
• Updated Manga info UI to show the source for the manga
• Added the ability to turn of homepage sections for sources
• Added the ability to update a source without uninstalling it
• Fixed chapter next and previous buttons
• Adjusted the padding under Description header of the manga page

Known Issues

• Advanced Search doesn't work
• Downloading doesn't work
• Longstrip reader zoom is a bit weird right now
• Update notifications don't work

Feedback is appreciated.
apps.localizedDescription:
Paperback is a fully ad-free manga reader for iOS 13 and iPadOS 13.4 and up.

iPad support
• Friendly layout with a robust double spread chapter reader for iPad.

MangaDex integration
• Paperback will sync your mangas and settings to and from MangaDex.

No advertisements
• Unlike other not-to-be-named apps and websites, this is a fully ad-free experience.

If you enjoy the app, please support the developer on Patreon to get access to the beta version of the app: https://www.patreon.com/FaizanDurrani

apps.name: PopcornTimeTV
apps.subtitle: Free TV Shows and Movies for iOS, with Butter!
apps.versionDescription:
This update will require you to uninstall the current PopcornTime and then reinstall.

Fixed unknown error among other updates and changes.
apps.localizedDescription:
PopcornTimeTV uses online torrents to find and stream brand-new movies and TV shows for free.

Useful features include:

• Finds the best torrents automatically
• Awesome catalog of movies and shows - if it's out there, you can find it
• No restrictions, subscriptions or ads
• The ability to select the quality and subtitles
• Instant streaming or downloads
• Trakt.tv scrobbling and watchlist syncing

If you want to know more about how PopcornTime works, visit the FAQ: https://popcorntime.app/faq

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you use PopcornTime with external devices.

apps.name: MediaBox HD
apps.subtitle: The best free streaming app for iOS.
apps.localizedDescription:
The best movie and TV streaming app for iOS.

• Uses direct streaming only, No Torrents (peer to peer / P2P)
• Media Box HD is constantly searching all over the web for the best stream from the most relevant sites.

The Best Features

• Discover popular Movies/Shows.
• Supports Chromecast, Roku, FireTV, Smart-TV, Wifi-Sharing.
• Trakt.tv sync
• Real-Debrid supported
• Offline Watching. Download in the background
• Files app support
• VLC-Player support
• Supports subtitles (from these sources: opensubtitles; popcorn-time; subscene; mediaboxhd)
• Customizable themes

The Best Service

• You can request Movies/Shows, Subtitles.
• You can help improve the app by giving us feedback about any problems you're having, and we will update the app ASAP

apps.name: Instagram Rocket
apps.subtitle: An app crafted with love by Instagram users.
apps.localizedDescription:
The Much-Awaited App

Rocket for Instagram could be categorized as an Instagram user’s dream tweak, because it’s going to let you do things that the photo and video sharing social network probably doesn’t want you to do, but nevertheless they’re things you, the user, have wanted for a long time. Rocket not only gives you the features that are missing from Instagram, but it also gives you full control over the app.

If you’re an Instagram user looking to enhance your abilities within the app and obtain features that no stock user is ever going to get, Rocket for Instagram could be your new best friend.

Amazing Features:

- Browse home feed in grid layout.
- Show following status in Profile.
- Download posts from your feed.
- Repost any post from your feed.
- Long press on posts to zoom.
- Copy post captions from your feed.
- Download all Stories on Instagram.
- Save videos from IGTV.
- View Stories without notifying others.
- Mute and unmute Stories.
- Disable Auto-Advance in Stories.
- Hide Stories from your feed.
- Play in high quality on Mobile Data.
- Long press on profile photo to zoom.
- Disable read receipts in DM.
- Disable Screenshot notifications in DM.
- Disable Read Receipts in DM.

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you share photos from your library and save photos to your Camera Roll.
This lets you take photos and record video.
This lets you record videos with sound.
This helps you and others find friends and more. Your contacts will be synced and securely stored on Instagram's servers.
Instagram uses this to make some features work, personalize content, help people find places and more. You can always change this later in your phone’s settings.
This lets you log into Instagram using Apple Face ID.

apps.name: Instagram Rhino
apps.subtitle: A powerful tweaked version of Instagram.
apps.localizedDescription: Instagram Rhino is tweaked version of the popular Instagram app. It adds all the features you've wanted, and more.

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you share photos from your library and save photos to your Camera Roll.

apps.name: WhatsApp++
apps.subtitle: WhatsApp but with more amazing features.
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:

• Hide your online and last seen status from others
• Disable read receipts so that others will not know when you read their message
• Disable delivery receipts so that others will know when the message has been delivered to you
• Customize the look and feel of Whatsapp
• Use a full profile picture that doesn't get cropped
• Send more than 10 media at once
• Share music from your device
• Record audio with a single tap rather than having to tap and hold
• Lock WhatsApp with Touch ID or passcode

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you send photos and videos from your library and save the ones you capture.
This lets you take photos and videos right from within WhatsApp.
Upload your contacts to WhatsApp's servers to help you quickly get in touch with your friends and help us provide a better experience.
This lets you make calls, send Voice Messages, and record videos with sound.
Use Face ID to authenticate on WhatsApp.
This lets you set reminders to call your friends back.
This lets you use Siri to quickly send and read messages and make calls.

If you always allow access to your location, you can choose to share your live location, and it will update even when you're not using the app. If you only allow access while using the app, you can only send your current location or a nearby place.
This lets you create events on your calendar.
